channel.title: Ultrawide+ on PhantomGamers
channel.description: Recent content in Ultrawide+ on PhantomGamers

item.title: Dreamfall Chapters UI Fix
item.description: A fix for the game Dreamfall Chapter’s UI when played at ultrawide and wider resolutions

item.title: Vampire The Masquerade - Heartless Lullaby UI Fix
item.description: A fix for the game Vampire The Masquerade - Heartless Lullaby’s UI when played at ultrawide and wider resolutions

item.title: SUWSF
item.description: Read about the SUWSF (Somewhat Universal Widescreen Patcher) utility for patching games to enable ultrawide support and more

item.title: Last Stop Ultrawide Fix
item.description: A fix that adds support for ultrawide and wider resolutions to the game Last Stop

item.title: Telltale Widescreen Patcher
item.description: Read about theTelltale Widescreen Patcher utility for patching games running on the classic Telltale engine to work with ultawide and wider resolutions
